Question
========

The following is an indication of 5 individuals as to how they are ranked in terms of authoritarian behavior and social status:______________. Authoritarian behavior: 2, 4, 3, 1, 5. Social status: 1, 3, 5, 2, 4. The value of the Spearman correlation coefficient here is

Answerlist
----------

* -0.6
* 0.54
* 0.6
* 0.7

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-0.6: Incorrect
* 0.54: Incorrect
* 0.6: Correct
* 0.7: Incorrect
